data.title: Unum Group
data.meta_description: This daily news site will help you make the most of your work life, with stories about the workplace and careers, financial health and benefits, and health and wellness.
data.text:
Getting the best out of your New Year’s resolution—not the other way around

A guide for the busy professional

Honoring Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. through service to communities

At Unum Group, we commemorate Dr. King’s legacy through our commitment to equality and fairness, both in the work we do as a business and through our service to our communities.

Celebrating 175 Years Through Service

We commemorated this milestone throughout the year by giving a platform to the voices of those who, through their actions and dedication, laid the foundation for our success.

Unum Group Joins the Top 100 of Seramount’s Best Companies List

This year, we rank in the top 100 of Seramount’s Best Companies list, identifying the top forward-thinking U.S. companies providing inclusive family benefits.

Juneteenth: Reflecting on our History

As we celebrate freedom, we must also take time to understand our history and reflect on the progress we still need to achieve.
